EmailTemplate.name: 202010_APAC_ATR_GTO_Webinar_15_October.Sorry We Missed You!
EmailTemplate.subject: Sorry we missed you!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Did you miss our webinar? Sorry we missed you, {{lead.First Name:default=customer}}!
Since you couldn’t make our webinar, it’s now on-demand <[[https://watch.honeywell.com/watch/sRrwpWJ72kiya3cYa6wviL?]]>, should you like to view it. Please use code 10152020.
Stay in the loop with us and you’ll be among the first to learn about upcoming webinars, events, product launches and more. Sign up here <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/forms/subscription-page]]>.
We look forward to seeing you next time!
Thank you, Honeywell Aerospace WATCH NOW <[[https://watch.honeywell.com/watch/sRrwpWJ72kiya3cYa6wviL?]]>
